original_text: And there were three side rooms on either side of the east gate. The three were of the same size, and the jambs on either side were of the same size.
korean_text: 그 동문간의 문지기 방은 왼쪽에 셋이 있고 오른쪽에 셋이 있으니 그 셋이 각각 같은 크기요 그 좌우편 벽도 다 같은 크기며

sentences.original_text: And there were three side rooms on either side of the east gate.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 동문 양쪽에 곁방이 세 개씩 있었는데.

sentences.original_text: The three were of the same size
and the jambs on either side were of the same size.
